column4: I'm trying to back-up stuff to DVD-Rs and am having an annoying issue.  It seems that Ubuntu insists that the maximum capacity for DVD-rs is 4.4GB when mine are all 4.7.  Is there a way that I can change this so I can use all the space that's there?
i presume the easiast way to use burning facility is to use k3b
I suppose, but even then I have to trick it by enabling overburning, which it doesn't always like to do anyways.
i don't do lots of burning so can't help there my friend but when i did, i found that to be the easiest
